name: Crystal Palace Friends
description:
Meggy the 1850s Megalosaurus and his friends are ready to discover the Crystal Palace Park in the FNaF World-ish adventure.

But, there's an enemy hidden in the hidden area of Crystal Palace Park.
The question is, who's he?

A short rpg game starring three original characters based on the three dinosaur statues at Crystal Palace Park (hence the title is "Crystal  Palace Friends").

This game is purely fiction and have nothing to do with real life Crystal Palace Park.

Please forgive me if there were mistakes of Crystal Palace Park map design. I never visited real life Crystal Palace Park before, but I really wished if I could visited that place.

The game already exported as game setup exported with RTP included.

Q: What are you use for making the game?

A: I use RPG Maker 2003.

Q: How about the sprites and the tilesets? What are you use?

A: I use Piskel App for sprites and Paint.Net to edit the tilesets.

Q: What the purpose of making this game?

A: This was purposed for a game jam.
